name: Underground (itch) (p1x3lruckus)
description:
Thousands of miles Underground, the player wakes up starving and alone. Find food, find answers and reach the surface...

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • E to pickup items
  • Number keys 0-9 to change active item
  • ESC for inventory and pause
  • Right Mouse button to use the selected item
